title: Campagnolo goes double discs on Colnago V3RS DV Double Ventoux road bike
content:
Campagnolo may have been late to the party with road disc brakes, but they might be making up for it with their new SmartDisc double disc brake tech on the special edition Colnago V3RS DV.
